targets.expr: sum by (job) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="system"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(job) group_left sum by (job)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{}[$__rate_interval]))) * $CPU_Max_Power * count by (job)(node_cpu_temperature{package=~"[0-9]+"}) + sum by (job) (DCGM_FI_DEV_POWER_USAGE) + $BasePower
